text: hta 'iidha wasal dhu alqarnayn 'iilaa maghrib alshams wajadaha fi mar'aa aleayn ka'anaha taghrub fi eayn hart dhat tin aswd, wawajad eind mghrbha qwmana. qlna: ya dha alqarnayn 'iimaa 'an tueadhibhum balqtl 'aw ghyrh, 'iin lam yqru btwhyd allh, wa'iimaa 'an tahasun 'ilyhm, ftelmhm alhudaa wtbsrhm alrshad
